Posts.Content: Aug 26, 2013 11:39AM Madilisa wrote: I have itching like what I think shingles might feel like.  3 months past radiation and still get the burn too once in awhile.  I have tried every cream and lotion otc and the only thing that works is benadryl every night.  I also tried triminaclone which is a prescription and it works somewhat but thins the skin because it is a steroid.  Does anyone know if latex or synthetic clothing can be an irritant?  Also chlorine in pools?  I try to avoid but want to go swimming once in awhile or do water aerobics and need to wear a conventional bathing suit.  None of this is super important in the grand scheme I consider myself lucky to be IIA or as the doc put it IZ and no node involvement but it is very irritating. I take tamoxifen.  Could this cause itching?
Posts.Title: Phantom Itching txmomof2 Jennie93
